title: The Beach is Fun! - 3
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Rina-chaaaan! Look, look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>So many pineapples... Where did they come from?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>The beach house over there was selling them. They said today is pineapple day~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>A day like that exists, huh... Rina-chan Board says, “Surprised”.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin went and bought some! There’s grilled pineapple, frozen pineapple, pineapple juice, and pineapple burgers! Let’s eat them together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Thank you. They all look so good.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>I don’t know which one to start with~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>The frozen ones, since they’ll melt... maybe?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Good idea! Here, Rina-chan, you can have the first bite! Open wide~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>*nom*... It’s cold and sweet. Delicious~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
